text: Vacuactivus is an international company for the production and sale of cryotherapy chambers and equipment for fitness rehabilitation, founded in 2000. Since 2013, it has been operating in the United States under the direction of Slim Wellness Studio LLC. The headquarters is located in Los Angeles, California with production in the US and Europe. Vacuactivus manufactures equipment for medical and rehabilitation centers, gyms, cryotherapy studios and health facilities. The company's products are distributed in 50 countries around the world. == References == Category:Companies based in Los Angeles
title: Vacuactivus
